title: Geotechnik A.V. logo
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140340im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo_6077.jpg)

Hi, I´m from Chile, and i need to know the font of my company logo. Any of you know it?

Thanks

Font: 

 Helvetica 65 Medium with some artificial condensing 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140340/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: F

comments.content:
Looks to be garden-variety Helvetica Bold, maybe with some artificial condensing:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317140340/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica/")
